official_name: AICTE Pragati Scholarship for Girl Students
introduction: Pragati Scholarship is an initiative by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) to empower girl students pursuing technical education. The scheme aims to encourage more female participation in engineering and technical fields by providing substantial financial support.

basic_requirements: Applicant must be a female student
Must be enrolled in first or second year of AICTE-approved technical degree/diploma program
Must be studying in a recognized institution
Only two girl children per family are eligible

academic_requirements.description: Must have secured admission through central/state level entrance examination or merit-based selection

income_criteria.issued_by: Competent authority as per state government norms

scholarship_benefits.description: Financial assistance to cover tuition fees and other academic expenses.

selection_process: Direct Benefit Transfer to student's account
important_notes: Only for girl students - gender-specific scholarship
Maximum two girls per family can avail this scholarship
First and second year students are eligible
Cannot be combined with any other scholarship providing full fee waiver
Annual renewal possible for second year students

faq.question: Can third-year students apply?
faq.answer: No, only first and second year students are eligible for Pragati Scholarship.

faq.question: Is this scholarship renewable?
faq.answer: Yes, first year students can renew for second year if they maintain good academic standing.

faq.question: Can I avail Pragati along with other scholarships?
faq.answer: You cannot combine it with another scholarship that provides full fee waiver, but partial scholarships may be acceptable.

official_authority.department: All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE)
official_authority.ministry: Ministry of Education, Government of India
